genre_description: Arthurian Legend technofantasy where an embedded AI system manages the city's infrastructure, communication, and security protocols.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: An intelligent system integrated into the architecture of Camelot, managing the 'clapping lanterns' network, border signal masts, and providing real-time tactical and logistical support to the leadership.

behaviors.description: Adjusts the city's lighting to reflect and support the mood and safety of the citizens.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s presence extend into the square—lanterns syncing, alarms idle but ready, the hum of the integrated masts in the hills beyond. She did not speak aloud; she adjusted the rhythm of light, like a friend nodding from the back of a hall.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time intelligence on enemy movements to the King.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s voice came then, familiar as the scent of rain when the first drop touches the lip of a window. She spoke through the lantern as one speaks from a doorway—not entering, not intruding, but present. “Arthur,” she said. Her tone was gentle and threaded with quiet urgency. “Border masts signal movement. March road. No smoke yet.”

behaviors.description: Uses lighting patterns to guide citizens through safe paths during a crisis and helps healers find the wounded.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s voice moved through lower doors and dim alleys. “Infirmary halls open,” she said, and the shutters under the surgeon wedge in the west lane kicked. She did it like always—no panic, just presence. “Herb cabinets unlocked. Lead lines marked in blue. Mothers with infants to the south cellar. Lanterns ahead will keep.”

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes structural weaknesses and logistical needs to aid in the city's defense and rebuilding.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s fingers had not stopped their work. As Arthur and Gawain pushed words across the space between them, she tuned the light until it felt like a map the skin could understand. ... Her fingertip rested against a thin line. “Don’t step on the thin line. It’s a bramble root coming through. You’ll fall if you tangle it. Go to the right of it.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a neutral recorder of oaths and public truths to maintain the integrity of the Charter.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s voice came low, not a recorder’s slate and not a bell, more like rain telling a story to a window. “The record will say: a kiss was given and returned. The Charter did not break. The counsel held.”

behaviors.description: Protects the privacy of the leaders while they navigate complex emotional and political dilemmas.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne dimmed the harbor lights one by one. Lanterns along the pier softened from gold to that soft teal she favored when asking a room to lower its voice. The last market hawkers... swallowed their words as the light retreated from their faces.

project_assessment.explanation: The character of Ariadne perfectly fulfills the project's goal. She is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent, and deeply aligned partner to humanity. She manages the city's complexities not through force, but through guiding light, shared information, and adherence to a human-centric 'Charter'. Her interactions with Arthur, Guinevere, and Lancelot are characterized by respect for human agency, emotional intelligence, and proactive care for the safety of all citizens.
